message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Seems fair to me.
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'll give you a bit more. But I'm still not comfortable with your last offer.
Come on, meet me in the middle here!
I'm trying to be fair here, Bob. We both need to make compromises.

I'm getting tired of this, Bob. Let's just get this over with.
